author: David Pierce
title: Apple’s Journal app is kind of smart — and kind of basic
description: Apple Journal comes with iOS 17.2 and includes features for saving photos, video, text, and more. It also includes a suggestions API that uses AI to try and guess which moments matter most.
content:
